values: 帆；航行；航海；巡航；航程；帆状物；帆布；篷帆布
航行；起航；驾驶帆船；乘船航海；扬帆行驶；迅速移动；翱翔；飘动；掠；航海；巡航

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 航行，起航（sail的现在分词形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 迎风航行；行为几失检点, 近乎不老实；冒风险(干危险或可能违法的事)
迎风航行；行为几失检点；近乎不老实；濒临险境
掩盖自己的本性；掩饰自己的真实意图
扬帆；扬帆航行；扬帆离去
航行；扬帆起航；出海远航

bilingual.source: These days, sail is a very popular sport.
bilingual.target: 如今，帆船是一项非常流行的运动。

bilingual.source: They are simple, safe, and have only one sail.
bilingual.target: 它们简单、安全，并且只有一张帆。

bilingual.source: How would you try to persuade adults to let you do something new and difficult, such as sail a dinghy on your own?
bilingual.target: 你会如何说服成年人让你做一些新的和困难的事情，比如独自驾驶小帆船？

bilingual.source: The sail was taut in the strong wind.
The sail was loosed to catch more wind.
bilingual.target: 帆被松开以捕捉更多的风。

bilingual.source: The sail became slack when the wind died down.
bilingual.target: 当风停下来时，帆变得松弛了。

bilingual.source: A sailfish has a distinctive sail-like dorsal fin.
bilingual.target: 旗鱼有一个独特的帆状背鳍。

bilingual.source: We raised the sail on the sea.
bilingual.target: 我们在海上升起了风帆。

bilingual.source: We need to repair the torn sail.
bilingual.target: 我们需要修理破损的风帆。

list.abstract: 《SAIL》这只歌，美国摇滚乐团AWOLNATION演唱。早在2010年，AWOLNATION就在EP《Back From Earth》中发布《Sail》，此后又收录于他们2011的首专。《Sail》于2011年9月首入Billboard榜，20周后出榜。时隔一年后再度入榜，共计在榜77周，如今已成为Billboard历史第二长在榜歌曲。在2013年Billboard年榜上排名25。《Sail》在美国本土销量上获得RIAA认证4白金。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, the sailing boat does have an engine. Full sail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，帆船上有引擎。全速前进！

yingyinNormal.en: You know, Joey, I could teach you to sail if you want. You could?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你要的话，我可以教你驾驶帆船。你会驾驶帆船？

yingyinNormal.en: What's the gala for? It's a regatta gala. Really? Do you sail? No, no, but I support it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么比赛？赛船会。你会开帆船？不会，可是我赞助比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't sail the world and make my fortune to splash around in a pedalo. We'll take the sailing boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想坐在独木舟上让我的财宝被溅湿。那我们租帆船。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa's boat is a sail boat, the wind makes it go along. I don't like my boat. It doesn't do anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇的船是小帆船。只要有风就可以前行。我一点都不喜欢我的船。因为他动都不动一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll huff, and I'll puff, and I'll blow your boat along. Hooray, it went really fast. Peppa loves her sail boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吹几下，用力吹，这样就可以把船吹走。好棒，他开得可真快呀。佩奇喜欢她的小帆船。

yingyinNormal.en: Or sail into a sea of luxury at Burj Al Arab, a seven star hotel, whose graceful curves echo the traditional wooden vessels of the Gulf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又或者到迪拜帆船酒店尽享奢华，这间七星级酒店的优美曲线，与波斯湾的传统木伐互相辉映。

yingyinNormal.en: I got sailing boats. It's a bit tricky to sail a sailing boat. And I got pedalos, they are nice and relaxing. Yes, they've got a big paddle wheel to make them go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有帆船。驾驶帆船是需要一点技术的。我还有脚踏船，他们比较休闲轻松。是的，你有一个大大的桨轮让它前进。

yingyinNormal.en: Anchor's away. Full sail. Aye, aye, Dog beard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在起锚了。全速全进。遵命，狗船长！

yingyinNormal.en: So, it is settled. We will sail like Columbus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，就这么决定了，像哥伦布一样去远航。

yingyinNormal.en: Life jackets on. Aye, aye, Captain Dog. Full, sail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 穿上救生衣。穿上了，狗船长。出发！

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't sail your boat, what do you do on it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不想开它出海，你在船上都做些什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: George! Raise the flag! Peppa! Ring the bell! Aye-aye, Captain! Granny Pig! Take the wheel! Aye-aye, Captain! Full sail! Full sail!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治！把旗子升起来！佩琪！敲响铃铛！是的！船长！猪奶奶！你来掌舵！是的船长。全速前进。全速前进。

yingyinNormal.en: It is Granddad Dog. Ahoy there, Grandpa Pig. Lovely day for a sail. Yes, ahoy there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗爷爷过来了。喔，你好啊，猪爷爷，打算驾船出游吗。恩，是的，狗爷爷你好啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Excellent. Danny, our boat needs a captain. It can't sail itself. Daddy, will you be my boat's captain?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那可太棒了！丹尼，我们的小船需要一名船长，没有船长他就不能起航了。爸爸，你愿意成为小船的船长吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Excellent. Danny, our boat needs a captain. It can't sail itself. Daddy, will you be my boat's captain?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那可太棒了！丹尼，我们的小船需要一名船长，没有船长他就不能起航了。爸爸，你愿意成为小船的船长吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Sailors always check the wind before they sail. But you are not a sailor anymore. Oh, yes. I did say that, didn't I?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？在出海前，水手们都要记得检查风向。但是你现在再也不是水手了。哦，对呀，这是我自己说的，不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Sailors always check the wind before they sail. But you are not a sailor any more. Oh, yes. I did say that, didn't I?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？在出海前，水手们都要记得检查风向。但是你现在再也不是水手了。哦，对呀，这是我自己说的，不是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know how to work it? Do I know how to work it? I'm Captain Dog, Come on Danny, all aboard, all sail. I like Captain Dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道如何操作吗？我知道如何操作吗？我可以是狗船长。来吧，丹尼，上船，前进！我喜欢爸爸船长。

yingyinNormal.en: I've got a boat that Granddad Dog made for me. That's an exact copy of my boat. You could help me sail it. That sounds like fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有一艘船是爷爷专门给我做的。啊哈！这模型和我的船一模一样。你可以帮我让他起航。这听上去很有意思。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 水手；海员；水兵；航海者；不晕船／常晕船的人

word_family.mean: n. 帆；帆状物；功能似帆的物体；航程；旅行；油布；篷帆布；帆船的使用；航行

sense_info_list.en: travel on water in a ship

word_usage.usage: sail作名词，表示“乘船航行”时，多用作单数形式，其前可加不定冠词a，如：go for a sail
sail作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或者代词，如：sail a boat

examination_example.sentence: Picture yourself at a college graduation day, with a fresh cohort of students about to set <highlight>sail</highlight> for new horizons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象你自己在大学毕业典礼那天，和一群即将启航前往新领域的学生在一起。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>sailed</highlight> with her daughter nearly 5, 000 miles from the Netherlands to South America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她和女儿从荷兰航行了近5000英里到达南美洲。

examination_example.sentence: In 982, a Viking called Eric the Red <highlight>sailed</highlight> west in search of new land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 982年，一位名叫“红色埃里克”的维京人向西航行以寻找新的土地。

examination_example.sentence: The Vikings then <highlight>sailed</highlight> south and made their second landing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 维京人随后向南航行，进行了第二次登陆。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>sailed</highlight> around it until they reached the western side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们绕过它，一直航行到西边。

examination_example.sentence: They travelled over snow-covered mountains and <highlight>sailed</highlight> hundreds of miles up icy rivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们翻越白雪覆盖的山脉，沿着结冰的河流航行数百英里。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence: And she was the first woman to <highlight>sail</highlight> around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她是第一个环球航行的女性。

examination_example.sentence: Jeanne Baret was the first woman to <highlight>sail</highlight> around the world
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍妮·巴雷特是第一个环球航行的女性。

examination_example.sentence: For thousands of years, people have used wind to <highlight>sail</highlight> boats and move water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几千年来，人们利用风来航行和灌溉。

examination_example.sentence: In 1766, Baret wanted to set <highlight>sail</highlight> with a group of scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1766年，巴雷特想和一群科学家扬帆起航。
